AqqacubeSEODescription: The AQQAcube is a filtration system that filters clean drinking water for people in need. üíßüö∞üí¶üíô Discover the water filter here.
Der AQQAcube ist ein Filterprodukt, das: The AQQAcube is a filter product that combines the advantages of the AQQAbag and the AQQAsystem. It is mobile and can easily be brought to the respective place of use. Nevertheless, thanks to its size and the filter surface it contains, the product can treat more than 1000 litres of clean water in 12 hours. If it is operated for more than 12 hours a day, the filter performance is even greater.
The AQQAcube is in use at the following locations:
Der AQQAcube kostet nur 1273,3 Euro brut: If you convert the costs for the filter, customs and shipping and the enormous filtering capacity, one litre of hygienically clean water costs less about 0.12 cents. By comparison, drinking water is sold in East African countries in plastic bottles of 1.5 litres each for about one euro. Thus, the product offers clean drinking water while saving a lot of money and plastic waste.
Die Anwendung ist dabei genauso einfach: The application is just as simple as with the AQQAbag: water from a lake or a river is put into the filter box and filtered with a membrane. The AQQAcube can be placed in a fixed location or transported. However, transport is only possible when empty.
Die R√ºckhalterate f√ºr Bakterien wurde: The bacteria retention rate has been certified by BCS, Florida, USA for the AQQAbag. The AQQAcube works according to the same principle. The core is our filter membrane. <1>We have uploaded the certificate for the AQQAbag here.</1>
Membranfilter mit hoher R√ºckhalterate: Membrane filter with high retention rate
Mit welchen Arten von Schmutzwasser der: You can see which types of dirty water the AQQAcube can handle <1>in this overview.</1>
Nach 6 Monaten im Dauerbetrieb muss der: After 6 months of continuous operation, the AQQAcube must be cleaned. <1>We have uploaded instructions for this here.</1> The cost of cleaning every six months amounts to about 100 euros.
min. 400 Liter Trinkwasser pro Tag bei 8: At least 400 liters of drinking water per day for 8 hours of operation time
